__prompts__.project_full_name: Your team's project name, how it will apears as title of the README
__prompts__.repo_name: The name of your repo. Usually, the project full name, with hyphen separated lowercase words.
__prompts__.package_name: The name of the package that will be imported. Careful, it cannot be hyphen separated words, only underscore separated.
__prompts__.authors: The name of the projects authors. Separate each name with a ','
__prompts__.github_url: The url to the github page of your project.
